content: Hi. I have a general question about Argonaut and FHIR versions. Currently Argonaut is based on DSTU2. Are there plans for / is there a time frame for adoption of R4 and beyond?
Argonaut has not released an R4 guide yet -- Argonaut priorities for 2019 are under discussion and hopefully will be announced in early Feb
within HL7, we migrated Argonaut requirements to HL7 US Core based on FHIR R4 -- draft content here: http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/US-Core-R4/
I think this is your best reference until Argonaut makes any official annoucement

Thank you. This is helpful.
Where should I be paying attention for updates?
